question:
A solution containing 0.1 M $CH_3Cl$ and 0.1 M $KSCN$ in $DMF$ reacts to give $CH_3SCN$ and $KCl$ with an initial rate of $2* 10^{-8}  mol L^{-1} s{-1}$. 
(a) What is the rate constant for this reaction?   (b) Calculate the initial reaction rate for each of the following sets of reactant concentrations:  (i) $[CH_3Cl]=  0.2 M,  [KSCN] 5 0.1 M$;  (ii)$ [CH_3Cl] = 0.2 M, [KSCN] = 0.3 M$;  (iii) $[CH_3Cl] = 0.4 M, [KSCN] = 0.4 M$.
